properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 4:08AM EST until February 7 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST this morning into this evening.
Rain will change to snow between 5 AM and 7 AM this morning.
Snow will continue through this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery roads as well as
sidewalks for the morning and evening commutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will gust around 40 to 50 mph.
The gusty winds combined with falling snow will cause visibility
to be reduced to below one-half mile at times. Gusty winds
could bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on
steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery,
increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
